name: translation-keys-lookup
description: See the texts associated to a translation/i18n key in your files, next to your keys, without switching context

peekTranslations.translationsFolders.markdownDescription:
Path of the root folders to recursively search for translation files.  
They are relative to the workspace root

peekTranslations.translationsFilenames.markdownDescription:
Filename(s) of the file(s) containing translations, separated by semicolumns.  
Regular expressions are not supported yet

peekTranslations.extensions.markdownDescription: Extensions of the files consumming i18ns keys

peekTranslations.color.markdownDescription: Color of the translation text (hex value or html color name)

peekTranslations.verbose.markdownDescription: Whether output logs are generated or not, in the Debug Console.
